website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for anyone with allergies, but its competitors offer more support.
pros: Ideal for allergy sufferers thanks to an innovative pollen and pet dander barrier
cons: Many customers wish it had more stuffing

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality - barely filled- buy a different one.
customer_reviews.text: That was a waste of money. It came folded in half, vacuum packed. When opened it barely took shape of how it should be, and it seems like it is filled only half way, so it is pretty thin. All in all, if you are looking for a cheap one that you will not like, buy this. Otherwise, spend the extra money (this was on sale for $10), and buy a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Click the HELPFUL BUTTON Under My Review If It Helped You. Thank You!

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This pillow, which took many weeks to ship to me because it's from China, measured 15" x 46" not 20" x 54" as advertised. As shown in picture next to the 20" x 54" case I purchased for the pillow. It is lumpy, the stuffing is cheap and I got what I paid for. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: bari b.

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Good as a Body Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Way too thick to use as a body pillow. It won't bend enough to rest your head and keep it between your knees.. Might be good as a cuddle pillow as it's super fluffy, but doesn't work for the purpose advertised.
customer_reviews.author: RTR

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: There is no perfect pillow for everyone- some people like it firm, some like it softer. I found this one to be perfect! It is on the softer side, so it wouldn't be great if you want put your head on it. But it's not flat and it cushions my knees nicely. I used to have a problem sleeping through the night, and hugging this pillow is one of the things that's helped me sleep more soundly. It's also nice in hot weather, because it stays pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Paige B.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews before buying 2 of these, because just like a lot of other reviews they are noisy, like crinkling noisy. But I mostly got them just to prop up my other pillows on so it definitely is working for me in that area. I do like how fluffy they are, and I put gray faux fur covers on them, so they look good as decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell and mildew
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is covered in black mildew spots. When I opened the box a horrible smell filled my living room. What worries me is the box holding the pillow was in great shape and had no smell, but the pillow inside stunk and you could see the mildew. To me it seems that whoever placed the body pillow into a box, knew that there was something wrong with it. I wish I would have spent more time looking over the reviews so that I wouldn't have had to go through this experience, or use my inhaler for the first time in months.
customer_reviews.author: Mrscave

customer_reviews.title: Went flat. Got extremely thin, in time.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This pillow was cheap, so I bought it. It didn't last very long, after using it became very thin. I can actually fold the body pillow in half, and its the same thickness as my regular standard size pillow. As it gets flat and thin your knees end up touching each other if you sleep on your side, no support for my back, which is why I bought it. I bought it to have support at my knees when laying on my side. I can actually feel my knees touching when I'm on my side.
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow just one issue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two one for myself and one for my husband. We both have the same, single issue. The pillows come compressed in packaging, they rebound well and are full and great support. No smell to them and so far have stayed full. The single issue is with the fabric for the cover, and this is not changeable. It is super noisy/crinkly. Ive not washed them as of yet to see if that helps so i may adjust/amend this review after. Overall a good body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Soft & fluffy
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size, body length, filled out a little after pulling it out if box. Delivered very fast. Comfortable. But very soft, not alot of support. My knees touch when lying on either side. It's nice to cuddle up in, but if you have back pain or need a firm pillow, this one may disappoint. Soft and pleasant, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Maryjane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It’s Fine but VERY Flat
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is fine for what it is I guess, but I’ve noticed on other reviews people getting different products under the same Amazon listing. The pillow I received is very thin and flat. I have a photo of this pillow next to a new body pillow I bought that gives a lot more support. I guess this is a good summer pillow since it’s so thin it doesn’t hold much heat, but I don’t know if you’ll get the same pillow I was sent or not.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like light and fluffy pillows
customer_reviews.text: I liked these because they weren’t too heavy or dense. I can move them from ones side of the bed to the other with out struggling too much while lying down. I got a more dense pillow for my husband. He ended up not liking it because it was heavy and a little too firm. Something to keep in mind while buying body pillows but at the end of the day I imagine it’s down to preference. They are pretty wide so if you share a bed you better have a big bed, but I think this would be a problem with any body pillow. I think I’ve had them for a year? They haven’t split in half or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Better For My Back
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased. I use it to sleep, to keep my hips aligned, I have it between my ankles and knees. Don't wake up with a sore back anymore. This 2nd one was for my wife. She tried mine while I was out of town and I never got mine back. Marriage, amiright ?

customer_reviews.title: Flat and saggy
customer_reviews.text: This was a disappointing purchase. I bought one a few years ago that was fantastic because it was so plump, firm, and durable, but the one I received this time was flat and saggy. It doesn’t have the support of even a regular pillow. Sufficient to say I won’t be buying this pillow anymore. I tried to buy one last year and ended up returning it for similar reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: so getting comfortable can be difficult
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase, but many reviews were positive. I recently had a second spine surgery, so getting comfortable can be difficult. This body pillow has made a difference. It does give comfort while lying on my sides which helps ease the sciatica pain. I recommend if your looking for some relief after surgery.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I left my previous body pillow at my brother's house in another state. I knew I could not go without, so I searched Amazon to find a new one. I have used several body pillows in the past, and this one is by far the most comfortable. I recently had a total knee replacement and could not get comfortable while sleeping. I have not been able to sleep on my stomach since pregnancy. That being said, I sleep on my side a lot, and this comfortable, soft, body hugging pillow provides just the comfort I need and helps me rest easier each night. I wish I would have 'forgotten or lost' the other pillow a long time ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brouillard

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is totally worth buying. Fluffy but still ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is totally worth buying. Fluffy but still mold-able and conforming to whatever position you use it in. Even my 2-year-old loves laying on this. I've had it for over a month now, and it hasn't flattened or lost it's shape. There was no smell when I opened it after delivery, however i let it air out for 24 hours before using it, just as a precautionary measure.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A

customer_reviews.title: Helps after surgery
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is very soft and comfortable. I ordered it to help me sleep better after abdominal surgery. I haven't ordered a pillowcase yet but I will. It fluffs up right away with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft and noisy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and stuffed them into one body pillow case. Even with 2 of them, they are way to soft to support any single part of your body. Almost useless as a body pillow, and the noise it ridiculous. Every time you roll over the thing crackles and pops. Hard pass on this one if you like firm support.
customer_reviews.author: NGL

customer_reviews.title: Back saver
customer_reviews.text: Mid-way through my pregnancy this has taken over my bed and I don't care. This is practical, has kept it's shape thus far and helps to ease my back pain. Highly recommend getting a cover because pillows without covers can become gross quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow previously and was so amazing I bought it again even tho it was almost double the price (it was that good!) then this comes in and it's so soft. Not what we ordered at all. I could have gone to Walmart and gotten better quality for half the price! Soooooo disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie  Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Medium means flat?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that the firmness would last for more than 3 times? I bought it so I can place between my knees for sleeping. That area is flat now, there isn't support. The insert says put it in the dryer to fluff it up. I live in apartment so I can't spend $3 extra dollars every time it needs to be fluffy. I don't think medium support is accurate for what I received.
customer_reviews.author: agent210

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeping with you
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Not a flat pillow. Some complained it's too fat, I'm very happy that it is. What is the point of a flat body pillow. It stays cool against my body for the most part. I purchased a 100% cotton cover for the pillow and it fit snug but nicely. I'm very happy with my purchase. I've had it for over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Good Body Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a body pillow before, but I wanted to try it out as it helps me keep my spine aligned during sleep. I have scoliosis so it's hard if I sleep funny as it makes my back tight. This pillow fits between my legs and isn't too puffy or hard. It's easily folded so I can sleep on my stomach as well. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body pillow, I absolutely love it! I had a bamboo body pillow and it lasted about a year and it had a lifetime guarantee. When I wanted to send it back they were going to charge me $60 where the pillow only cost me 80. Instead of sending me a new one they were just gonna have me send it back ,so they make it so that it’s more of a hassle and not worth sending it back. This one gives me no back pain it’s comfortable it keeps puffed up and even. I’d highly recommend this body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Flat services no purpose for which intended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. It appeared to be fluffy when it came out of the squashed bag. Anyway it is the longest flat pillow, that serves no purpose for what we purchased it for. I did not return because it’s more then a hassle then what it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: longnails

customer_reviews.title: Super flat do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst pillow I've ever had. I had to get rid of my old body pillow just because it was almost 5 years old. Even though it was old it had more stuffing and firmer then this pillow. The pillow is flat and there's no fluff to it. It would be better if I cut it in half and made 2 or 3 small pillows out of it. I would have returned it just didn't fell like dealing with the hassle. Might just buuy stuffing and stuff it correctly myself.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, my bad.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow but I sure do miss my old one. It was 20 years old and absolutely needed to gone years ago! The AllerEase pillow is kind of “krinkly” (is that even a word?). I need it because of my back pain but it krinkles every time I move. I should have known it would have a weird fabric when it had “Aller” in its name. I will probably need to buy a new pillow because this one isn’t doing it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Adams

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this pillow it is comfortable, sturdy, firm and durable. I love this pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow, I like that it’s a body pillow and it is very thick and sturdy in the sense that it doesn’t go flat it stays full and fluffy. I really enjoy it I will probably buy more. You will need a special pillow case or in my case I used to regular pillow cases. I’m a big hello lover and I like to have a lot of pillows around me and this is a great addition to the bed.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Arrived quickly, “poofed” up quickly after being removed from vacuum sealed bag, seems like it will be easy to clean Cons: One end is soft and the other firm - unexplainable and odd It’s a little “loud”, sort of like a dense plastic sound.
customer_reviews.author: Allison and Jason

customer_reviews.title: Flat!!! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This body pillow nis FLAT. DONT waste your money.It serves no purpose and looks fookishnon my bed as if it's super old and overused but it's brand new. The cover for it which I bought the same size as the pillow is super baggy on it because of how flat the pillow is.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow (or so says amzn) about two years ago - it’s not the same pillow. The first one was great - very full and firm. This one is half the fill and is really cheap. Avoid Update a few months later - literally a terrible product and I don’t write bad reviews often. Avoid even if it’s a best seller or amazon choice. Truly terrible.
customer_reviews.author: rojito2110

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pillow
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pillow. It works like a pillow. It’s still in good condition after a year and hasn’t lost its support or shape. It’s still a pillow. Nice and long though.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Justice

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: If your body needs support this is not the pillow for you. It's too soft to support the body at night, on night one. Had 1.5 sleepless nights on it. I tossed and turned so much that my dog got mad at me. Both her and I went without sleep due to this pillow. Day 3: On it's way back to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: I should give 5 stars, but....
customer_reviews.text: The product description is a bit misleading in stating; "100% cotton cover..." which led me to believe pillow case cover.... I just interpreted it wrong. Also, one of the corners won't come out. I've pulled and punched and swung and nothing works to get the few inches of fill to come out, so that corner just looks weird, even in the pillow case I ended up buying for it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!  Flat!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. I received it and it is flat. I put it in the dryer to try to fluff it (as notes in the instructions) without success. I received a replacement and it a little bit fluffier but still not what it should be. Next time I will make the trip to Bed, Bath and Beyond for a long lasting, fluffy body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Says

customer_reviews.title: fluffiness fades, love that it is hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this pillow after knee surgery this summer, and this helped so much for sleeping at night. On purchase it was super fluffy and buoyant. After around 4 months, the pillow is noticeably less fluffy however. I have not tried to clean it as it is pretty large, and hasn't gotten dirty. Love that is hypoallergenic as I am allergic to dust. I still sleep with this pillow, might get a new one though as again fluffy is fading.
customer_reviews.author: Syd Kotecki

customer_reviews.title: Too soft to be practical
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and therefore won’t support me if I side sleep. Mine was clean and I did not have any of the issues others wrote about except that it is too soft to offer support. I don’t care for firm pillows but this one is so soft it smushes flats when using.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice body pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These body pillows are wonderful, nice and squishy and moldable. My body and back are more comfy with these to wrap my legs around and cuddle. I was thinking of getting a small one for my head, so I tried sleeping on it and it goes too flat to give me the neck support I need.
customer_reviews.author: BanDeclawing

customer_reviews.title: GROSS!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow came in shrink-wrap.... but it was covered in mold! Soooo gross. Ugh, the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Creteloc

customer_reviews.title: Softer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have grown to enjoy this pillow. My last body pillow was a bit firmer and gave more support so if you like a thicker more supported pillow please note.
customer_reviews.author: Golly

customer_reviews.title: Was not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Soft but it crunches. I’ve never had a noisy pillow until now. After a month I threw it in a closet and replaced with something else. I got tired of the noise the pillow made and my husband started to complain. It’s an OK pillow... if you don’t move.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Flat and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This pillow did not puff up as much as I had hoped it would. It fits fine inside the pillow case (the dementions are accurate) but it is pretty flat and flimsy and has a crinkly sound quality to it. Luckily we got it more for decoration, but if your planning to actually use the pillow, your head will sink and the pillow will flatten with use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing; much too thin; compresses too readily under light weight; NOT a choice buy
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my shoulders, thus I need to support my upper arm while sleeping on my side. Unfortunately, this pillow is too thin right out of the package, and when I lay my arm on it this pillow readily compresses under that light weight such that my arm gets almost no support. Lesson learned: don't buy inexpensive crap. Hey Amazon: NOT A CHOICE BUY!
customer_reviews.author: B. Szafranski

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not what it once was
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this pillow twice before and was very happy with it. This time, however, the pillow was short and limp - not the same at all. Booo.
customer_reviews.author: Follaway

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this body pillow. I have back pain and using this at night has helped me get comfortable as I sleep. It is firm enough to keep its shape yet feels soft enough to hug my body at night and keep me comfortable. After receiving it in the mail I stuck it in the dryer on low heat for a few minutes, and it fluffed out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always have to sleep with a body pillow and this one works great to take for my pet sitting job. I have to take the pillow with me to the home I am staying. I have a bag that I put the pillow end and it squishes right in there.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: very fluffy
customer_reviews.text: i bought this not realized how fluffy it's be. makes for a great pillow on my bed for various reasons...propping up and etc but it's not comfy for pregnancy because it's almost too much fluff. im skinny so my weight doesnt hold it down . lot so maybe this would be . plus for women of another size. nice quality, tho
customer_reviews.author: onewisesun

customer_reviews.title: Opposite of Hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: This pillow caused an allergic reaction in my 3 yr old. Red itchy bumps all over his ears and face. After switching back to his old pillow everything cleared up
customer_reviews.author: CMMLA

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squishy BUT loud crinkle noise when squished
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is soft and bouncy. It has a slow rise when you squish it to fit whatever form you need. CONS: sounds like crinkling paper when you squish it. Can be loud if your trying to adjust it in the middle of the night. Overall, a good quality body pillow for your money.
customer_reviews.author: lala_Ichabod

customer_reviews.title: Good Pillow for Propping Others Up.
customer_reviews.text: The stuffing inside the pillow makes it really soft, but the fabric on the outside of the pillow is pretty rough. It doesn't bother me, since I don't lay/sleep directly on it, but it may be an issue for others if they enjoy sleeping directly on body pillows. I use them to prop up other pillows on the bed, so this works perfect for me, regardless of the slight roughness of the outside.
customer_reviews.author: April R.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: This body pillow allows for great support of myself and the 3 little ones who join in while watching TV from bed. It came vaccum packaged and unwrapped so easily and full that no fluffing or other action was needed before using it. Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Alpha.Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Worst Amazon purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this pillow. It clumped and bunched after less than two weeks, very uncomfortable. I tried laundering as directed, used the "tennis ball" trick in the dryer and nothing helped. I've purchased Aller-Ease bed pillows before, and absolutely loved them. This is either an inferior design or most likely a cheap imitation being sold by Amazon as an Aller-Ease pillow. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Still soft and full after months of using it
customer_reviews.text: I always feel like I’m taking a chance when I order a pillow online without actually feeling it, but I have no regrets with this body pillow. It arrived packaged well and is very soft and full. I’ve had it for a few months now and it’s still just as full as when I first received it. The price was also better here than in my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.text: 1.) Didn’t ship until 8 days after being ordered. 2.) Absolutely no support - the pillow is softer than butter, won’t fluff up, and turns flat immediately after being laid on. 3.) False advertisement: the pillow is only 49.5 inches long, 50 if you’re being generous. I suffer from back pain that comes and goes constantly, 24/7. I was so excited when this pillow arrived - not even an hour later, and I’m returning it. Very disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Greyson

customer_reviews.title: Great hypoallergenic product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot less stuffed than I expected. I wanted it as a back rest and realize it would only probably work as an actual pillow. I purchased for the hypoallergenic reason and would buy again for that reason alone. It was clean, had no scent and I would buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Nice plush pillow
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected this to be way skimpier and sad, but I needed something to replace mine when it went to body pillow heaven. I was pleasantly surprised. This bad boy is big and plush and delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.andMrs.MorenoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Needs more fluff
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed at how flat it was when I opened the package. It fluffed up a little after a couple minutes, but just wouldn’t support anything.. I shook all the filling to one side and am just going to go buy more filling for it.. Wish it had more fluff, but for the price isn’t too bad.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy steal for the price
customer_reviews.text: On the softer side initially because its so poofy, but not so much that it won't support you when compressed - it feels firmer as you lay on it. The hypoallergenic cover can be a little noisy (like any pillow or mattress cover) when you crinkle or grab the pillow, but nothing out of the ordinary for those kinds of covers. For ~$10-12, this was a great deal. I grabbedto go with it, and I couldn't be happier considering how little I spent for a body pillow plus two cases.
customer_reviews.author: Johaan

customer_reviews.title: I need to have a body pillow on the firmer ...
customer_reviews.text: I need to have a body pillow on the firmer side. I want something that isn't going to squish down from me sleeping on it. This is not the pillow for me. It doesn't hold it's shape well, and I don't see any real difference between this and the body pillow I can get at Wal-Mart for under $10.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft body pillow, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I saw the negative reviews and became skeptical, but this pillow really is great. It came in nice new packaging and had no stains or signs of prior use as some people have complained of. I love that it is in the softer side because I hate hard pillows. I took away 1 star because it is a couple of inches shorter than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: texasyelladoll85

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap pillow to ship to a hotel for a cruise. It was there when I arrived which was great. It is cheap in price. The pillow was already kinda flat. After 1 night stitching started to come undone had to sew the ends. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D.

customer_reviews.title: These seem well made and are priced reasonably for having the Allerease covering
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for Allerease pillow COVERS, and this was in the search return. Given the inflated prices of most body pillow cases, I paid what seemed like a fairly high price for these pillow covers. 2 large boxes arrived. They were pillows, not cases. Despite my ongoing frustration at the lack of notice that products in search returns may be only related to original search, I have to say the pillows are soft, seem well-sewn and arrived on time as promised. I can't speak for durability, but I have every expectation they will flatten out in the coming weeks and months.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my third body pillow over many years and it is by far the best. It’s big, fluffy, maintains its shape well, And I love cuddling up to it at night. My husband doesn’t love how much space it takes up in our bed but we’re getting a King size bed in a month so that won’t be an issue much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey J.

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe there are some quality control issues? Mine was great though. Not too firm or fat and not too soft or thin. Great body pillow or head rest pillow for watching TV from bed. The removable and washable cover is a great feature, although the zipper is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Too soft!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy body pillows in the store so I can feel them. This was and last time I buy any pillow online. It is a good pillow if you like soft pillows. I don't. I thought it would be firm like most other body pillows I have owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Beth C.

customer_reviews.title: This came folded in half and no matter what I ...
customer_reviews.text: This came folded in half and no matter what I have done to fluff it back up in the middle, is permanently flat in the middle section.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Aller-Ease body pillow
customer_reviews.text: These pillow are great. I changed out our old body pillows at the risk of being in trouble with the wife because our old pillows were very good quality but had lost their support. I nervously waited for her to get in bed but when she did they passed with flying colors. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Halliea

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is holding up well after many nights of use. Still pretty well shaped and not much shifting of the filling. Only thing I am not thrilled with is that it is slightly larger than my previously purchased cases. They work, but a couple are a little snug. Other than that, a good pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed-product has totally changed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought these pillows for my husband and myself. We loved them the first time, so I bought them again once the originals became worn. These are DEFINITELY not the same pillows. I have since gone back to the originals because the new ones are not supportive and very squishy. Does not support my spine during sleep like before. Woke up in pain. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Medium Density is too soft for me...
customer_reviews.text: I need a body pillow to side sleep. Without a body pillow I have back pain. But this one is too soft and has already lost density where my legs go over it. I will need to purchase another one that is firmer.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Zie

customer_reviews.title: Wow. What a difference.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is incredible. I sleep with it every night. Not only do I feel like Im snuggling a teddy bear every night. It relieves my back pain when I lay on my side and have the pillow between my legs. Its amazing. Definitely recommend to literally anyone who enjoys extra comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Slack

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our sleep routine. It’s been helpful in relieving lower back pain and is very comfortable. When not sleeping, it’s a nice bolstering second layer of pillow for sitting g up in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is not the highest quality pillow you can get but the price more than makes up for it. It does exactly what it is supposed to do at a fraction of the cost of more expensive options. Have been using for a year plus and I have had zero desire to upgrade. Used as a body pillow nightly to support knees and arms.
customer_reviews.author: Granola Muncher

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is perfect! It provides the support I need for sleeping on my side. Fluffs right back up and stays. Great length too. I'm 5'4 and it is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Bnbkw2013

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Suprised
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't think I was going to like it. Seems very soft & goes flatter than I'm used to when side sleeping. My back on the other hand likes it very much! Buy a cover for it, it needs one. It's like sleeping with another person in the bed. When hubby is being annoying I have my pillow to cuddle!
customer_reviews.author: Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.... I didn't expect this to be so full but it is a great pillow that is everything I like in a body pillow. I do recommend a satin type fabric for a cover on this, otherwise it does not follow you under the covers very well when you move (if that makes sense).
customer_reviews.author: Cultureduo

customer_reviews.title: great pillow, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow, it is the exact size that it was listed as.(which for some reason can be a problem?). It comes vacuum sealed to prevent any outside contaminants. This pillow with a zip up case has a permanent place on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnant woman
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pregnant wife and she swears by it. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ceejay Henson

customer_reviews.title: great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is still going strong after 6 years. Used as decorative pillow and occasionally slept on it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: VERY CHEAP and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: it is made of the stuffing one uses in benches, etc. cheap material and will not last - waste of money. spend $10 more and get something w/ a better filing. I regret this purchase
customer_reviews.author: DogZilla_2013

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and Crunchy
customer_reviews.text: Noisy and crunchy pillow. Never had a yucky crunchy, noisy, pillow before. Not sure what the material is but it is not nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Ah, for me it's to light weight, I wanted a heavier pillow. I use one every night and I am six foot three, two hundred and twenty five pounds, this pillow becomes a sheet, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Pillow 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what this is filled with but it sounds like it’s filled with crinkly plastic bags or something.
customer_reviews.author: L&J💜

customer_reviews.title: A Big Pillow Deal
customer_reviews.text: I'm being generous, in that this is really more of a 3.5 star product. The pillow is nice and long and the outside is soft, but the stuffing moves around inside a little too much. I'm 6'4" and this goes from my chin to my knees, which is perfect. The pillow is very comfortable and is of medium-soft firmness. My daughter can use this almost like a mattress (she's 5) and thinks it's a blast. Bottom Line: A solid product at a solid price.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is very comfortable. A little hard to get in the pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is very comfortable. A little hard to get in the pillow case at first but it flattens out a little after use. I have had it almost a year and it still has its firmness. Good quality - gave one as a gift to my brother and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. Hardly any filing
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Hardly any filing. I bought two and stuffed both fillings into one to make one still flimsy pillow. I should just have gone to the store for this one. I really don't understand how anyone can give this product a 4 or 5 start rating.
customer_reviews.author: signal shark

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - no support
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is filled with about half as much stuffing as would be required to support a child's leg or arm. The only reason I'm not marking this as one-star is because I usually dismiss one-star ratings. Make no mistake. This is a one star pillow. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Oahu

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! It's not a "body" pillow. I took it out of the box and plastic bag and let it air out like it said. It looked like a good " body pillow until I laid on it. All the air left it and the pillow went flat as a pancake. I have to fold it in half just to use it. Save the money and get a better body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown Books

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable pillow. I dont use it for pain relief so i cant really rate on that. I bought a walmart pillow to compare and this one is much more comfortable. Im keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: emiliospaniard

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got 2, one for me and one for my bf. I use mine every night. I love to side sleep. My bf uses his sometimes but it makes him too hot. It’s super comfy though.
customer_reviews.author: Onesassymommy

customer_reviews.title: Great long pillow!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a TV for Christmas, we ended up putting our old one in our bedroom. We wanted something to help prop us up on our bed so we bought this pillow. It works perfectly and is very soft and comfy. Very pleased with this pillow
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my guest bedroom, for propping the display pillows up on the queen size bed, and it seems to work nicely for that. The dogs have found it very comfortable to lay on and sleep also.
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: Nice an full
customer_reviews.text: It's very fluffy and soft. Nice an full. Unfortunately it is not very firm and has a lot of give to it. When I lay my head on it, my head sinks quite a bit. I have other pillows on top of it so it does the job but my previous body pillows did not so this.
customer_reviews.author: Crystaphaze

customer_reviews.title: i love the zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it was the right price and I wanted a zipper so my new pillow wouldn't slide off. it serves it's purpose and it a nice thick material, I have also washed and dryed it and has come out like new, no shrinking.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMae

customer_reviews.title: The comfiest pillow I own
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow so much! It literally feels like a cloud I am obsessed with it! I've had other body pillows before and this one is the best by farrrrr!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and soft body pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to others I scrolled thru. Arrived on time. Very fluffy and soft. Still perfect after a few months of nightly use. My husband and I both love them. Will definitely order these again when needed or recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: JackiTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfy body pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my girlfriend since her old body pillow would no longer remain fluffy. I also bought a sherpa cover for it. She loves them both. Standard size is easy to buy other covers.
customer_reviews.author: That XJ guy

customer_reviews.title: What the heck ?
customer_reviews.text: Omg, it was nothing like the thing that i ordered, i looked at peoples reviews and they got it differently than mine, mine is more flat and half filled while their pillows is fulled and fluffy, mine is poorly made, while my pillow is no where like theres, i would not recommend buying It from here ):<
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep I've had in literally years
customer_reviews.text: SUPER SOFT! It came vacuum-packed so I was a little worried, but I shouldn't have been, it fluffed up great. I've had mine for three days and I think I haven't sleep this well in something like four years. Breathes great, doesn't get hot or stuffy. I have an inflammatory joint disease so I need something to prop one leg up on or I wake up with the worst knee pain, this is just the perfect size and is helping my back pain too. I should've bought this way sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Fluffy For My Tastes But Nice
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was a little fluffier then I hoped for. It's a nice pillow but I don't like overly-fluffy pillows and this seems to be one of the very many on the market that is just that-- Too fluffy. It's a decent pillow though. I am not using it anymore but it seems to be able to hold up well with daily use. Just be cautious of the fluffiness. It's very fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: J. HurleyTop Contributor: Cycling

product_meta.title: AllerEase 100% Cotton Allergy Protection Medium Density Body Pillow - Breathable, Hypoallergenic Fiber Fill, Prevents Buildup of Dust Mites and Household Allergens, Allergist Recommended, 20" x 54"
product_meta.description: The AllerEase 100% Cotton Hypoallergenic Allergy Protection Medium Density Body Pillow offers full-body support! Its extra-large, medium density design removes the need for multiple bulky pillows and supports your back, hips, neck, and stomach. This is the perfect body pillow for expectant mothers, dorm rooms, kids bedrooms, and more! Our plush, comfortable body pillow measures 20” x 54” and is stuffed with a hypoallergenic polyester fill that will provide you or your loved one with support and comfort all night long! This full-body support pillow is made with an allergy defense fabric that blocks dust mites, pollen, and other common household allergens from collecting in your pillow. This 100% breathable cotton body pillow is completely machine washable! For maximum, long-lasting clean, simply toss it in the washing machine on warm, using non-chlorine bleach as needed, and tumble dry low. The hypoallergenic polyester fiber fill of this pillow re-fluffs after each wash, ensuring that your body pillow will provide comfort and support for years to come. AllerEase is the leading brand of allergen barrier bedding. All our products provide natural allergy relief, are allergist recommended, and are tested by an independent 3rd party for durability and protection. We're confident you'll LOVE our products.
feature_bullets: 100% cotton cover with hypoallergenic fiber fill.

COMFORTABLE AND SUPPORTIVE: This hypoallergenic, medium density body pillow measures 20” x 54” and takes the place of multiple bulky pillows to support your hips, back, neck, and stomach, making it an excellent choice for expectant mothers, dorm rooms, kids bedrooms, and more!

COMPLETE ALLERGEN PROTECTION: If you wake up congested, it could be allergens in your pillows. AllerEase’s 100% cotton allergen barrier medium density body pillow is stuffed with a hypoallergenic polyester fill that offers complete barrier protection against dust, pollen, pet dander and other household allergens.
BREATHABLE: This down alternative body pillow is made of 100% cotton which allows air to pass through the fabric, keeping you cool and comfortable all-night long.
MACHINE WASHABLE: Machine wash and dry this hypoallergenic body pillow for easy care! To clean: machine wash warm in non-chlorine bleach as needed and tumble dry low.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – AllerEase is the leading brand of allergen barrier bedding and this cotton, multi-functional body pillow is allergist recommended.
